name: Shokaku 68020: AMIGA 30th Anniversary Edition
overview: A Japanese card game as "Hanafuda" was video game-ized. "Hanafuda" is the card game played in Japan from ancient times. The game was created in 2003 and updated as a 30th Amiga anniversary present in 2015 as Shokaku-68020 AMIGA 30th Anniversary Edition by Renya Iizuka of Pastel Spirits.
